name: 91a16205-a929-48d6-af9a-2098c8f80476
displayName: Add a company logo to invoices

text.text: How do I add my company logo to invoices?

text: To add a company logo to invoices, you can follow these steps: 1. Click Admin 2. Click the Billing tile 3. Click Company Profile 4. On the upper-right of the page, click Upload a logo 5. Browse to the location of the logo and click Open 6. Click Confirm 7. Scroll down the bottom of the page and click Save. The next time you generate an invoice, the logo will display in the upper left corner. For best results, ensure that the image is a 4:3 aspect ratio.

text.text: Where can I find the option to display my company logo on invoices?

text: To display your logo, you can follow these steps: 1. Click Admin 2. Click the Billing tile 3. Click Company Profile 4. On the upper-right of the page, click Upload a logo 5. Browse to the location of the logo and click Open 6. Click Confirm 7. Scroll down the bottom of the page and click Save. The file name will display next to the "Upload logo file" link. The next time you generate an invoice, the logo will display in the upper left corner.

text.text: What should I consider regarding the aspect ratio of the logo image?

text: For best results, ensure that the image is a 4:3 aspect ratio.

text.text: Where does the company logo display on the invoice?

text: The logo will display in the upper left corner of the invoice.

text.text: What is the recommended aspect ratio for the logo image?

text: For best results, ensure that the image is a 4:3 aspect ratio.

text.text: Can I upload a custom logo for my invoices?

text: To display your logo, you can upload it to the system by following these steps: 1. Click Admin 2. Click the Billing tile 3. Click Company Profile 4. On the upper-right of the page, click Upload a logo 5. Browse to the location of the logo and click Open 6. Click Confirm 7. Scroll down the bottom of the page and click Save

text.text: How do I browse and select the logo image file for upload?

text: To browse and select the logo image file for upload, you can follow these steps: 1. Click Admin 2. Click the Billing tile 3. Click Company Profile 4. On the upper-right of the page, click Upload a logo 5. Browse to the location of the logo and click Open 6. Click Confirm 7. Scroll down the bottom of the page and click Save.

text.text: What action should I take after selecting the logo image file?

text: The next time you generate an invoice, the logo will display in the upper left corner.

text.text: Will the uploaded logo appear immediately on the invoice?

text: Yes, the next time you generate an invoice, the logo will display in the upper left corner.

text.text: Where can I find the confirmation message after uploading the logo?

text: The file name will display next to the "Upload logo file" link.

text.text: Is there any specific location on the invoice where the logo will be placed?

text: To display your logo, you need to click Admin, then Billing, then Company Profile, then Upload a logo. The file name will display next to the "Upload logo file" link. The next time you generate an invoice, the logo will display in the upper left corner. For best results, ensure that the image is a 4:3 aspect ratio.

text.text: What should I do if I want to change the logo displayed on invoices?

text: To change the logo displayed on invoices, you need to click Admin, then Billing, then Company Profile, then Upload a logo. The file name will display next to the "Upload logo file" link. The next time you generate an invoice, the logo will display in the upper left corner.

text.text: Can I preview the invoice with the newly added logo before saving the changes?

text: You can preview the invoice with the newly added logo before saving the changes. A PDF will open in a new tab in the format you selected. You can print or download the preview invoice.

text.text: Are there any size limitations for the logo image file?

text: The file size limit for logo attachments is 500 MB.

text.text: Is there an option to revert to the default settings if I'm not satisfied with the logo display?

text: Yes, there is an option to revert to the default settings if you are not satisfied with the logo display. To do this, you need to click Admin, then Billing, then Company Profile, then Upload a logo. The file name will display next to the "Upload logo file" link. The next time you generate an invoice, the logo will display in the upper left corner. For best results, ensure that the image is a 4:3 aspect ratio.

text.text: Where can I find additional support or guidance if I encounter issues while adding the company logo to invoices?

text: You can find additional support or guidance if you encounter issues while adding the company logo to invoices by visiting the help center.
